altername_name: Disc Station Bessatsu - I Miss You. Tanaka Katsumi
name: Disc Station Bessatsu: I Miss You
overview: DiscStation Bessatsu i miss you. (DiscStation別冊 i miss you.) is a 1997 magazine special released by Compile in Japan. It comes with a disc either for Sega Saturn or Sony PlayStation. While it carries the "DiscStation" name, it is not a compilation of games, but rather of various music-related videos.
